description: Image of three pink tulips on a back ground; image is printed on the top half of the sheet
provenance: John E. Andrus III [Minneapolis, 1909-2012]; by descent to his daughter Catherine Andrus [Minneapolis]
text: Mikos Pogany is a Hungarian-American printmaker who largely devotes himself to the production of monotypes, often images of flowers that strike a balance between lush and austere.
title: Three Doveman Tulips from Tropides Islands
